## Questions

1. Find the unemployment rate for 25 to 34 year-olds by degree type
   for the years 2014 through 2016. Make a long data frame and use it to
   make a figure of trends over time by educational
   attainment.  

	See Table 501.10 of the NCES Digest of Education Statistics, which can
	can be found
	[here](https://nces.ed.gov/programs/digest/2017menu_tables.asp)).

#### Submission details

- Save your script (`<lastname>_assignment_scraping.R`) in your `scripts`
  directory.
- Push changes to your repo (the new script and new folder) to GitHub
